Distribution: indigenous; Australia , Victoria ,
Distribution: indigenous; Australia , Victoria .
Distribution: Australasian; Australasia: Papua New Guinea , New Zealand and Australia : Queensland , New
Distribution: Australasian; Australasia: New Zealand and Australia : Tasmania ; new for Victoria .

Up to now, 53 species have been known from Victoria ( Niedbała 2012 ). In the newly examined material 37 species were found. Among them 23 species have been already known to occur in Victoria , 14 have been recorded for the first time from this region, whereas seven of them are new to science.

A genus new for Victoria
Arphthicarus
was represented by two new species
A . donnabuangensis
sp. nov.
and
A . sassafrasensis
sp. nov.
.
A list of all new localities from different areas of Victoria and the species found with the number of specimens is presented in the Appendix.
